name: Super Skidmarks
overview: Experience total rally rage with Super Skidmarks. Race at top speed, slide, scream, and crush car metal over the toughest dirt tracks devised. Choose from a variety of challenging play modes and thrill to simultaneous four-player power. Super Skidmarks features six unique vehicles (bug, 4x4, sports car, compact, grand prix car, and cow -- yes, cow) plus ultimate turbo models of each, 24 of the wildest 3D isometric tracks with twisting gradients, and full and split-screen modes for up to four at once.
